name: ACTing Minds
description:
Join Steve as he embarks on a journey into his own mind. Venture through the inner workings of his psyche while face to face with painful past memories. Learn how to make Steve cope with his struggles in life to realise his full potential and bring him home.

This game (directed by Dr. Darren J. Edwards of Swansea University) is based on a psychological therapy called acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT). You will learn about how to use ACT in your life through embedded learning. This game is not a replacement for any professional psychological help should you need it, rather it will introduce you to some basic principles of ACT through playing the game.

FEATURES
• Explore a stylised 3D environment filled with metaphor and uncertainty.
• Acquire hidden collectables as you navigate the world.
• Original music and handcrafted audio (headphones recommended!)
• Exceptional performance from voice actor Harry Bell.

ACTing minds is a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases. This game includes one of six acts with other acts in development.
